name: Incarceration
description:
Arrow keys to move.

I did not create and do not own the rights to "Genius of Love" and am not associated with Tom Tom Club. I also did not create and do not own the rights to the background used herein.

Incarceration exists for one reason and one reason only.

This reason is to be used as a subtle and insidious method of torture.

It is a small enough file that it could easily be sent over Discord, or even some email sites.

All I can say is that you must use it wisely - only on those who truly deserve to play it.
